title: Pumpkins, Peril and a Paella
description: Small-town murder meets a big-hearted café owner When a dead body is discovered during the annual St. Eves Halloween fair, it isn't long before Charlotte Denver finds herself up to her neck in helping to solve yet another murder mystery. This one, however, proves to be a little too close to home for her liking as she finds herself, and the man she loves, in danger. And what is the secret that her fiancé, Nathan, is keeping from her? With clues to find, a killer to catch and a wedding to organise, Charlotte has her work cut out for her in this, the fourth book in the Charlotte Denver Cozy Mystery Series.
author: Sherri Bryan
